name: oConcepto A 3d Platformer without jumping
description:
A 24 hours gamejam project.

You can walk on walls if you stand near them.  

It's ment to be played with an xbox controller.  

If you are on a wall, you can hold RT to aim, and use RB to shoot.

It was a fun experience to work the concept! i surely continue the development of the idea.
